name: icy-wind
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.
